[mutik](../README.md) > [API Documentation](./README.md) > useSelector

# useSelector

React hook to subscribe to Mutik state. Must be called underneath a Mutik .

```typescript
function useSelector<State, Value>(selector: (s: State) => Value): any
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                  | Description         |
| --------- | --------------------- | ------------------- |
| selector  | `(s: State) => Value` | A selector function |

## Returns

`any`

The slice of Mutik state

## Example 1

```jsx
const selector = state => state.count;

function Label() {
  const count = useSelector(selector);
  return <p>The count is {count}</p>;
}
```

## Example 2

```jsx
function User({ id }) {
  const selector = React.useCallback(state => state.users[id], [id]);
  const user = useSelector(selector);
  return <p>The username is {user.name}</p>;
}
```
